ipa: ðeɪ ˈhævənt fɪkst ˈɛniˌθɪŋ jɛt.
spell: They haven't fixed anything yet.

ipa: ðeɪ hæv toʊld mi ˈɛvriˌθɪŋ.
spell: They have told me everything.

ipa: hæv ðeɪ ˈɛvər ˈbitən ju æt naɪt?
spell: Have they ever beaten you at night?

ipa: ɪt hæz bɪn ˈreɪnɪŋ ɔl deɪ.
spell: It has been raining all day.

ipa: ə haɪ raɪz
spell: a high rise

ipa: ə ˈtaʊər
spell: a tower

ipa: haʊ hæv ju bɪn?
spell: how have you been?

ipa: haʊ ˈɔfən hæv ju dʌn ɪt?
spell: how often have you done it?

def1: Мне это никогда не было нужно.
ipa: aɪ hæv ˈnɛvər ˈnidɪd ðæt.
spell: I have never needed that.

ipa: ˈmʌltiˌstɔriɪd ˈbɪldɪŋ
spell: multi-storied building

ipa: wi ˈhævənt ˈitən jɛt.
spell: We haven’t eaten yet.

ipa: wiv bɪn ˈsteɪɪŋ hir fɔr ə mʌnθ naʊ.
spell: We've been staying here for a month now.

ipa: wiv bɪn ˈstʌdiɪŋ ɔl wik.
spell: We've been studying all week.

ipa: wi hæv bɪn ˈhævɪŋ ə ɡʊd taɪm
spell: we have been having a good time

def1: Он работает всю неделю. У него ботинки грязные.
ipa: hiz bɪn ˈwɜrkɪŋ ɔl wik. hɪz ʃuz ɑr ˈdɜrti.
spell: He's been working all week. His shoes are dirty.

ipa: hi hæz toʊld mi ðə nuz.
spell: He has told me the news.

ipa: ʃi hæz toʊld ˈsʌmθɪŋ tu mi.
spell: She has told something to me.

ipa: hæz ʃi toʊld ðə nuz tu ju?
spell: Has she told the news to you?

def1: Она самая красивая женщина, которую я когда-либо видел.
ipa: ʃi ɪz ðə ˈprɪtiəst ˈwʊmən aɪ hæv ˈɛvər sin.
spell: She is the prettiest woman I have ever seen.

ipa: ʃiz bɪn ˈlɪsənɪŋ tu mi ɔl naɪt.
spell: She's been listening to me all night.

ipa: haʊ ˈmɛni bʊks hæv ju rid?
spell: How many books have you read?

ipa: haʊ lɔŋ hæz ʃi bɪn ðɛr?
spell: How long has she been there?

ipa: haʊ lɔŋ hæv ju bɪn ˈduɪŋ ɪt?
spell: How long have you been doing it?

ipa: haʊ mʌʧ hæv ju dʌn?
spell: How much have you done?

ipa: haʊ lɔŋ hæv ju dʌn ɪt?
spell: How long have you done it?

ipa: hæv ðə pəˈlis ˈɛvər əˈrɛstɪd ju?
spell: Have the police ever arrested you?

ipa: hæv ju dʌn ɪt bɪˈfɔr?
spell: Have you done it before?

ipa: hæv ju ˈɛvər dʌn ɪt?
spell: Have you ever done it?

def1: Ты ходишь по магазинам весь день. Ты хочешь есть.
ipa: ju hæv bɪn ˈʃɑpɪŋ ɔl deɪ. jʊr ˈhʌŋɡri.
spell: You have been shopping all day. You're hungry.

def1: Эта машина у нас уже 3 года.
ipa: wi hæv hæd ðə kɑr fɔr θri jɪrz.
spell: We have had the car for three years.

ipa: ɪt hæz bɪn ɡreɪt!
spell: it has been great!

ipa: aɪ hæv ˈɔlˌweɪz laɪkt ɪt
spell: I have always liked it

def1: Это лучшее, что я когда-либо читал.
ipa: ɪts ðə bɛst θɪŋ aɪ hæv ˈɛvər rid.
spell: It’s the best thing I have ever read.

def1: Это лучший фильм, который я когда-либо видел.
ipa: ɪts ðə bɛst ˈmuvi aɪ hæv ˈɛvər sin.
spell: It’s the best movie I have ever seen.

ipa: ðə hit ˈaɪlənd ɪˈfɛkt
spell: the heat island effect

ipa: aɪv bɪn ˈrʌnɪŋ ɔl deɪ.
spell: I’ve been running all day.

ipa: aɪv bɪn ˈkʊkɪŋ ɔl deɪ.
spell: I've been cooking all day.

ipa: aɪ ˈhævənt ɡɔn tu bɛd jɛt.
spell: I haven’t gone to bed yet.

ipa: aɪ hæv lɪvd hir sɪns ˈtwɛnti ˈtwɛnti θri
spell: I have lived here since twenty twenty three

def1: Я занимаюсь этим 3 дня с пятницы.
ipa: aɪv bɪn ˈduɪŋ ɪt fɔr θri deɪz sɪns ˈfraɪˌdeɪ.
spell: I’ve been doing it for three days since Friday.

ipa: aɪ hæv stɑkt ʌp
spell: I have stocked up

ipa: aɪ hæv bɪn hir ɔl deɪ!
spell: I have been here all day!

ipa: aɪ hæv bɪn hir fəˈrɛvər
spell: I have been here forever

def1: я знаю её лично целую вечность
ipa: aɪ hæv noʊn hɜr ˈpɜrsənəli fəˈrɛvər
spell: I have known her personally forever

ipa: aɪ hæv noʊn ju sɪns aɪ wʌz ə ʧaɪld
spell: I have known you since I was a child

def1: Я знаю это уже больше 10 лет.
ipa: aɪ hæv noʊn ɪt fɔr mɔr ðæn tɛn jɪrz.
spell: I have known it for more than ten years.

ipa: aɪ hæv ˈnɛvər noʊn ðæt.
spell: I have never known that.

def1: Я никогда этого раньше не делал
ipa: aɪ hæv ˈnɛvər dʌn ɪt (bɪˈfɔr).
spell: I have never done it (before).

ipa: aɪ ˈhævənt toʊld ˈɛniˌwʌn.
spell: I haven't told anyone.

def1: Я плохо сплю в последнее время.
ipa: aɪ hæv nɑt bɪn ˈslipɪŋ wɛl ˈrisəntli.
spell: I have not been sleeping well recently.

ipa: aɪ hæv bɪn ˈwɜrkɪŋ hir fɔr ə wik naʊ.
spell: I have been working here for a week now.

ipa: aɪ hæv sæt hir ɔl ˈivnɪŋ!
spell: I have sat here all evening!

def1: Я убираюсь всё утро. Я устала.
ipa: aɪv bɪn ˈklinɪŋ ɔl ˈmɔrnɪŋ. aɪ æm ˈtaɪərd.
spell: I’ve been cleaning all morning. I am tired.

ipa: aɪ hæv ɔlˈrɛdi dʌn ɪt.
spell: I have already done it.

ipa: aɪv bɪn ˈduɪŋ ɪt ɔl deɪ.
spell: I’ve been doing it all day.

ipa: aɪ ˈhævənt dʌn ɪt jɛt.
spell: I haven’t done it yet.

def1: Я это тебе уже 3 раза сказала.
ipa: aɪ hæv toʊld ju ðæt θri taɪmz ɔlˈrɛdi.
spell: I have told you that three times already.
